title: World of Warcraft: Ashbringer
description: Based on the world's most popular massively multiplayer online role-playing game, prepare to enter the World of Warcraft! As the Lich King's plague of undeath ravages the human kingdom of Lordaeron, a mighty blade is forged from a dark orb! In the hands of Highlord Alexandros Mograine, the blade will become legend...but until then, Mograine must fight for his life! In the end, all roads will lead to Light's Hope Chapel, where the seemingly unstoppable Scourge army will mount a relentless offensive to destroy the Argent Dawn. "Micky Neilson and World of Warcraft" artist Ludo Lullabi present a tale of Azeroth that ties directly to the smash-hit World of Warcraft expansion pack, "Wrath of the Lich King"!
author: Micky Neilson
